EmailTemplate.subject: RECORDING LINK | HANDOUTS | CEU CERTIFICATE: Best Practices in EMS Billing
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STAY CONNECTEDÂ <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> FOLLOW-UP INFORMATION FOR: Best Practices in EMS Billing Webinar
{{lead.First Name:default=EMS Professional}} - Thanks for your interest in our webinar and learning about Best Practices in EMS Billing, including the following:
- Daily tips for improving your EMS billing processes - Catching potential 'red flags' - from call intake and field documentation to invoice production and reimbursement to billing and collections - Maximizing your billing and collections - Actual examples from EMS services and lessons learned
RECORDING DATE: Thursday June 28, 2012
SPEAKERS: Larry Cole <http://www.tritechems.com/documents/LarryColesBIO.pdf>, TriTech Regional Sales Manager and former Finance Director at Kanawha County Emergency Ambulance Authority Kathy Ransom, TriTech EMS Industry Education Coordinator, C.A.C.
For information about TriTech's EMS Billing - or other integrated EMS applications - please contact us at sales@tritech.com <mailto:sales@tritech.com> or 800-537-3927. LINKS:
RECORDING LINK: http://recordings.tritech.co/06-28-12.wmv <http://recordings.tritech.co/06-28-12.wmv> [please note audio issues improve after Larry's initial few minutes]
HANDOUT LINK: www.tritechems.com/documents/June28-2012_Webinar.pdf <http://www.tritechems.com/documents/June28-2012_Webinar.pdf>
NAAC CEU CERTIFICATE LINK: www.tritechems.com/documents/June28-2012_CEUCert.pdf <http://www.tritechems.com/documents/June28-2012_CEUCert.pdf>
